title: FULL ACCOUNT TAKEOVER
content:
Summary:
Using the selfservice portal @ https://mymtn.com.ng/ an attacker can easily takeover any nigerian mtn phone number, and get access to some information, like date of birth, full name, etc. The attacker can also make use of any airtime found on the account.
Steps To Reproduce:
I have made a detailed video showing the process.
Impact
Full Access to the Account
Access to some private information, like date of birth, nin, etc
Access to use up all credits and airtime on the account,
Access to modify the data on the account
steps: Navigate to the MTN self-service portal at https://mymtn.com.ng/
Follow the process outlined in the detailed video to take over any Nigerian MTN phone number
vuln_description: Using the self-service portal, an attacker can take over any Nigerian MTN phone number, gaining access to private information such as date of birth, full name, NIN, etc. The attacker can also use any airtime on the account and modify the account data.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward process on a self-service portal without requiring complex interactions or multiple components. The attack is simple and does not involve manipulating complex application states or novel logic.
